sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import {Header} from 'semantic-ui-react' const mapStateToProps = state => { return { values : state.contact, values1: state.sauce, toppings: state.toppings } } const Order = ({values, values1,toppings}) => (

Contact Information:
Name: {values.name}
Email: {values.email}
Name: {values.address}
Phone_Number: {values.phone_number}

Sauce Level and Crust Types:
Crust: {values1.crust}
Sauce: {values1.sauce}

Toppings:
{Object.entries(toppings).map(([key,val])=>

{key}:{val}

)}

); export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Order);
